scripts.postinstall: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../api && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd api && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run web"
scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:api
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:api
